name: Fruit Tandem Turnovers
desc: Pastries baked with berries. After the fermented dough is rolled into long strips, sugar and berries are added, and the whole thing is rolled up to bake before being sprinkled with chopped berries. Usually paired with coffee, this confection takes center stage at breakfast and during afternoon tea.

value.text: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.
